attributes.action: STOP THE EU FROM EVER MAKING US DRIVE IN KM INSTEAD OF MILES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: STOP THE EU FROM EVER CHANGING THE SIDE WE DRIVE ON AND MAKING US USE KM INSTEAD OF MPH .THIS SHOULD BE PUT DOWN AS A NATIONAL SYMBOL AND TRADITION SO THE EU CANT TRY AND CHANGE THE WAY WE DRIVE.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
